SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS SEQ ,SCHOOL_CODE ,SCHOOL_NAME ,CONCAT(ORGAN_SIDO_NM, ' ', ORGAN_SIGUNGU_NM, ' ', ORGAN_EUPMYEONDONG_NM) AS ORGAN_ADDRESS FROM ST_SCHOOL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND (@ROWNUM:=0)=0
AND SCHOOL_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchData}, '%')
AND SCHOOL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchData}, '%')
ORDER BY SCHOOL_CODE ASC

SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS SEQ ,SCHOOL_CODE ,SCHOOL_NAME ,CONCAT(ORGAN_SIDO_NM, ' ', ORGAN_SIGUNGU_NM, ' ', ORGAN_EUPMYEONDONG_NM) AS ORGAN_ADDRESS FROM ST_SCHOOL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND (@ROWNUM:=0)=0 AND SCHOOL_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', 'DE', '%')
AND SCHOOL_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchData}, '%')
AND SCHOOL_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchData}, '%')
ORDER BY SCHOOL_CODE ASC

SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS SEQ ,DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD ,DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM ,CONCAT( DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIDO_NM, ' ', DENTAL_HOSPITAL_SIGUNGU_NM, ' ', DENTAL_HOSPITAL_EUPMYEONDONG_NM ) AS ORGAN_ADDRESS FROM ST_DENTAL_HOSPITAL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND (@ROWNUM:=0)=0
AND DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchData}, '%')
AND DENTAL_HOSPITAL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchData}, '%')
ORDER BY DENTAL_HOSPITAL_CD ASC
